text: Absolutely love this laptop! The performance for streaming games is incredible, especially the NVIDIA GTX 960. Boots up super fast and handles everything I throw at it. The keyboard is also top-notch. Highly recommend for anyone looking for a beast like the Acer Aspire V15 Nitro Black Edition VN7-591G-70RT 15.6" IPS Intel Core i7 4th Gen 4720HQ (2.60 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960M 8 GB Memory 1 TB HDD Windows 8.1 64-Bit Gaming Laptop!

The port selection is also top-notch. The speakers is also top-notch. Highly recommend for anyone looking for a beast like the Acer Aspire V15 Nitro Black Edition VN7-591G-70RT 15.6" IPS Intel Core i7 4th Gen 4720HQ (2.60 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960M 8 GB Memory 1 TB HDD Windows 8.1 64-Bit Gaming Laptop!

The Acer Aspire V15 Nitro Black Edition VN7-591G-70RT 15.6" IPS Intel Core i7 4th Gen 4720HQ (2.60 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960M 8 GB Memory 1 TB HDD Windows 8.1 64-Bit Gaming Laptop does what it says on the tin. Good for content creation and gaming, but the trackpad could be better. Had a minor issue with driver updates being a bit tricky, but it was resolved. Solid, but not spectacular.
